name: Manic Pietro
overview: Help Pietro on his journey, thought 20 different brand new levels, based on some of our favorites 80's, 8 bit games. The brave souls that can finish this adventure, will get a secret code to unlock the original 20 Manic Miner levels. If you die on your quest, you will get a code to continue playing from your last stage, with the lives you have when start it, but remember there's no swordfish for cheaters!. There's another more codes so keep playing! A remake of the master piece "Manic Miner" from the genius Matthew Smith, for contest ZX-DEV M.I.A-Remakes.
